english.segment1: What is it you want My child?. What is it your heart desires?. Ive given you so many things. Things you thought would satisfy. But, youre not happy, youre not happy..
english.segment2: Lord, Im drowning in my sin. Whats a lonely heart to do?. Strip away the substitutes. Til I desire only You..Til. I desire only You.
english.segment3: Only You.. Only You can satisfy. Only You.. Only You can fill my life. Lord, take all and everything. Til I desire only You.. Til I desire only you
